Martial Cadence.name: Martial Cadence
Martial Cadence.blurb: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.
Martial Cadence.description: Innate: Jarvan IV's basic attacks deal 8% of target's current health  physical damage, with a minimum of 20 damage and capped at 400 damage against non-champions.
Martial Cadence.description2: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
Martial Cadence.notes:
* The triggering attack will apply other  on-hit effects and can  critically strike as normal, as well as apply  life steal.
 The bonus damage will not do any of these and neither will it affect structures.

 Martial Cadence will not be applied if the attack is parried.

Dragon Strike.name: Dragon Strike
Dragon Strike.blurb: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
Dragon Strike.description: Active: Jarvan IV extends his lance in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies and  reducing their armor for 3 seconds.
Dragon Strike.description2: If the lance connects with a deployed  Demacian Standard, Jarvan IV  dashes to it,  knocking up nearby enemies along his path for 0.75 seconds.
Dragon Strike.notes:
* Dragon Strike's damage will not benefit from its own armor reduction.
 Dragon Strike will still pull Jarvan IV to his  Demacian Standard if he is immobilized but he will remain as such when he reaches his destination (duration permitting).

Golden Aegis.name: Golden Aegis
Golden Aegis.blurb: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
Golden Aegis.description: Active: Jarvan IV  slows all nearby enemies for 2 seconds.
Golden Aegis.description2: Jarvan IV also  shields himself for 5 seconds, increased by 1.5% of Jarvan IV's maximum health for each enemy champion hit by Golden Aegis.
Golden Aegis.notes: * Golden Aegis has no cast time and will not interrupt Jarvan IV's previous orders.

Demacian Standard.name: Demacian Standard
Demacian Standard.blurb: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
Demacian Standard.description: Passive: Jarvan IV gains permanent  bonus attack speed.
Demacian Standard.description2: Active: Jarvan IV throws a Demacian flag to the target location, dealing  magic damage to all nearby enemies.
Demacian Standard.description3: The flag then remains for 8 seconds, granting  sight around it and providing an aura that grants Demacian Standard's bonus attack speed to all nearby allied champions.
Demacian Standard.notes:
* The bonus attack speed from Demacian Standard's aura will apply to Jarvan IV and stack with its passive's.
 Demacian Standard can be targeted by allied minion-targetable abilities ( Teleport,  Safeguard).
 Even though the Demacian Standard has a finite amount of health it is both untargetable to enemy basic attacks as well as immune to area-of-effect damage.
 This makes it effectively invincible and indestructible.

Cataclysm.name: Cataclysm
Cataclysm.blurb: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.
Cataclysm.description: Active: Jarvan IV  leaps  unstoppably to an enemy champion and deals physical damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival.
Cataclysm.description2: Upon impact, he creates a circle of impassable terrain for 3.5 seconds that grants  sight around it. Jarvan IV can reactivate Cataclysm to destroy the circle.
Cataclysm.notes:
* Cataclysm will not deal damage, generate terrain, or refund its cooldown if Jarvan IV is killed mid-leap.
 Cataclysm does not track targets who transit out of their location.
  Ornn's  Searing Charge will not destroy the whole ring but only the part that  Ornn collides to.
